episode.title: I Have Faith in the Rice
episode.rawTitle: 247: ‘I Have Faith in the Rice’ With Paul Kafasis
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Paul Kafasis returns to the show. Topics include last week’s Apple product releases — new iPads, iMacs, and AirPods — and the de-Steve-ification of Wynn Las Vegas.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Paul Kafasis returns to the show. Topics include last week's Apple product releases -- new iPads, iMacs, and AirPods -- and the de-Steve-ification of Wynn Las Vegas.
